disclaimer.title: Keyrock Know Your Customer Onboarding Flow
disclaimer.subtitle:
Welcome to Keyrock's KYC Onboarding Flow. This process will allow us to get to know you better and will help us to satisfy any legal and regulatory laws in relation to Money Laundering and Terrorist Financing.

Records of all identity checks will be maintained for up to 10 years after the termination of the business relationship or after execution of a transaction, unless required otherwise by the supervisory or judicial authorities. The records will be handled in confidence in accordance with EU Regulation 2016/679 of 27 April 2016 on the protection of natural persons with regard to the processing of personal data and on the free movement of such data. Keyrock shall delete the personal data at the end of the prescribed period.

disclaimer2.title: Keyrock Know Your Customer Onboarding Flow
disclaimer2.subtitle:
In order to go complete the KYC process, please make sure that you have the following documents ready to be uploaded before you start :
- A copy of the company's Incorporation Act;
- A copy of the company's Memorandum & Article of Association;
- A copy of the ID (passport) and proof of residence (not older than 3 months) of all Directors and Ultimate Beneficial Owners (owners of 25% or more equity of the entity and/or controlling persons);
- A copy of a corporate document showing the shareholder structure and voting rights of the company;
- A copy of the UBO register, commercial register or companies register detailing the information on beneficial ownership of the company;
- A copy of utility bill showing the company's business address (not older than 3 months);
- A list of the company's authorised signatories;
- A proof of ownership of all the company's wallet addresses that will be used with Keyrock (for incoming/outgoing transfers);
- If you are 1) an exchange platform or 2) planning to act on behalf of your own customers, another form is required to be fulfilled ("Keyrock Due Diligence Questionnaire") that you can download now, and will also be available for download at the end of the flow.

Please note that only pdf and jpg/jpeg documents can be uploaded.

Should any questions arise, please don't hesitate to send an email to onboarding@keyrock.eu.

website_url.label: Please add a link to the website of your company (if available)

activity.label: Please describe your business activity
activity.helper: You can explain here in a few words/sentences what your company does, a brief history, what objective/strategy it pursues

business_jurisdictions.label: Please detail the jurisdictions where your business is performed

customer_jurisdictions.label: Please detail the jurisdictions of your customers

subject_to_aml_cft.label: Please indicate whether you are subject to AML/CFT legislation

aml_cft_supervisor.label: If yes, please indicate the name of the AML/CFT supervisor

individuals_list.title: II. Ownership and information relating to Ultimate Beneficial Owners
individuals_list.subtitle:
Please complete the ownership information.

Owner (legal entity) / Beneficial Owner (natural person) are:

Type 1:
Category 1: the natural person(s) who ultimately own(s) or control(s) a legal entity through direct or indirect ownership of a sufficient percentage of the shares, voting rights or ownership interest in that entity, including through bearer shareholdings.
Category 2: The natural person(s) that exercise(s) control over the company via other means.
Category 3: If no natural person under category 1 or 2 can be identified, the natural person(s) who hold the position of senior managing official(s) need to be considered as ultimate beneficial owners.


Type 2:
The natural person(s) for whose benefit a transaction is being executed or for whose benefit a business relationship is being established

individual_additional_data.title: II. Ownership and information relating to Ultimate Beneficial Owners

options.Private entity (not a personal asset hol: Private entity (not a personal asset holding vehicles)
options.Publicly traded with 51% or more shares: Publicly traded with 51% or more shares traded
options.Shares are listed on a regulated market: Shares are listed on a regulated market in the EEA or an equivalent regulated market outside of the EEA  or the entity is 100% subsidiary of a company that meets the aforementioned condition

company_have_nominee_shareholders.label: Does your company have nominee shareholders and/or shares in a bearer form?

business_relationship_capacity.label: Capacity in which you are acting in the context of the business relationship

criminality.label: Has your company/any of the authorised representatives / directors / ultimate beneficial owners been subject to any allegations of criminality and/or criminal convictions ?

individual_pep.title: II. Ownership and information relating to Ultimate Beneficial Owners
individual_pep.subtitle:
In this part, we ask you to confirm whether any member of your company's senior management or associates parties are politically exposed persons ("PEP") or associated to a PEP.
Senior management or associates parties refers to authorized representatives, directors and ultimate beneficial owners.A politically exposed person (PEP) is an individual who is or has been entrusted with a prominent function.
A person associated to a PEP refers especially to the family members and close associates.A (non-exhaustive) list of PEP is available here: Politically exposed persons (PEPs): Comments and recommendations by the NBB | nbb.be (Part 1.1 PEP).
Details on persons associated to a PEP are available via the same link (Parts1.3. Family members of PEPs and 1.4. Persons known to be close associates of PEPs)

pep.label: Is any member of the senior management or associated parties a Politically Exposed Person (‘PEP’) or associated to a PEP ?

pep_name_function_jurisdictions.label: Please provide the name of the person(s), the function(s) and the jurisdictions involved
pep_name_function_jurisdictions.helper: If the answer to the above is ‘yes’

company_supporting_process.label: Did the company develop written procedures and supporting processes to prevent, detect and report suspicious AML/CFT activity ?

company_perform_customers_due_diligence.label: Does the company perform customers due diligence checks in order to ensure 1) the identity of its customers and 2) the origin of their funds?

additional_comment.label: Do you have any additional comment/information you would like to provide to Keyrock?

terms_and_conditions.title: VI. Declaration
terms_and_conditions.subtitle: Please note that after having approved the information submitted, you will not be able to modify it anymore and you will be directed to the upload of documents. If you have any addition/modification to make, please contact onboarding@keyrock.eu
terms_and_conditions.label: By checking the box, I approve the declaration.

checks_list.subtitle:
Please proceed with the necessary verifications listed below.
Please note that each document is required.

Our team will keep you informed of the result of the verification.
